verses.roman:
eta bali' sei vipra sukhe pāka kaila
uttama prakāre prabhuke bhikṣā karāila

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; sei vipra—that brāhmaṇa; sukhe—in great happiness; pāka kaila—cooked; uttama prakāre—very nicely; prabhuke—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhikṣā—lunch; karāila—gave.
translation: Saying this, the brāhmaṇa very happily cooked food, and a first-class dinner was offered to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
